title: Practical Competency Enhancement Program Through Data Structure Visualization

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: A blended education model conducted in a smartphone-centric, limited technological environment, designed to allow practitioners to learn while balancing work.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the node structure and pointer operations of a linked list with 80% accuracy using visualization tools based on the split-attention effect.
Learners can implement basic operations (insertion/deletion/traversal) of a singly linked list in code by referencing workflow examples from visualization tools.
Learners can select appropriate data structures for real-world data processing scenarios through project-based assessment and validate them using visualization tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
